body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, this is Louis White from Speedy Autos. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Amanda Flores.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Amanda. Can you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five two three four one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Amanda. And can you also share your email address with me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's a m a n d a f l o r e s at email dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information, Amanda. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling disappointed about the delay in shipping of my car.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for the inconvenience, Amanda. Let me check on the status of your shipment and provide you with an update.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for bringing this to our attention, Amanda. We will work to resolve this issue promptly. Have a great day!
